BG3 Martial Adept Tips & Notes

Martial Adept provides a superiority die for maneuvers, similar to the Battle Master subclass. It is not as powerful since it offers fewer dice. Multi-classing into Battle Master might be a better option for more versatility. Notes & Tips go here
